summary: An email exchange discussing an upcoming December 4, 2018 trial in Palm Beach County Circuit Court. The case is a malicious prosecution lawsuit filed by an attorney (who represented multiple Epstein victims) against Jeffrey Epstein, stemming from a prior lawsuit Epstein filed against that attorney.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Subject of the email discussion; being sued for malicious prosecution by an attorney who represented his victims. Previously sued the attorney claiming involvement in a fraud related to an Epstein business.

persons.name: Attorney
persons.role: Plaintiff in malicious prosecution lawsuit, former representative of Epstein victims
persons.context: An attorney who represented multiple Epstein victims and is now suing Epstein for malicious prosecution, claiming Epstein's prior lawsuit against him was wrongful retaliation.

persons.name: Law Partner
persons.context: The attorney's law partner who was convicted of a fraud related to an Epstein business, which was the basis for Epstein's prior lawsuit against the attorney.

connections.description: Attorney is suing Epstein for malicious prosecution, claiming Epstein's prior lawsuit was retaliatory for the attorney representing Epstein's victims.
They were law partners; the partner was convicted of a fraud related to an Epstein business.
The law partner's fraud was related to an Epstein business, which Epstein cited in his prior lawsuit against the attorney.

events.title: Scheduled trial for malicious prosecution lawsuit
events.description: A trial is scheduled for a malicious prosecution lawsuit filed by an attorney against Jeffrey Epstein in Palm Beach County Circuit Court.

events.title: Epstein's prior lawsuit against attorney
events.description: Epstein previously sued the attorney, claiming the attorney was involved in a fraud related to an Epstein business that the attorney's law partner was convicted of.

events.title: Attorney files malicious prosecution suit
events.description: The attorney filed a malicious prosecution lawsuit against Epstein, alleging Epstein's prior lawsuit was wrongfully filed in retaliation for the attorney representing Epstein's victims.

keyFacts: A trial is scheduled for December 4, 2018, in Palm Beach County Circuit Court for a malicious prosecution lawsuit against Jeffrey Epstein.
The plaintiff is an attorney who previously represented multiple victims of Jeffrey Epstein.
The lawsuit stems from a prior suit Epstein filed against the attorney, which the attorney claims was retaliatory for his representation of Epstein's victims.
Epstein's prior suit alleged the attorney was involved in a fraud related to an Epstein business, for which the attorney's law partner was convicted.
